父亲身份与心血管结局之间是否存在关联？父亲身份与心血管健康 (CVH)、疾病 (CVD) 和死亡率之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240531/Is-there-an-association- Between-fatherhood-and-cardioangio-outcomes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240531/Is-there-an-association- Between-fatherhood-and-cardioangio-outcomes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=392e1099-ff80-4d60-8fd3-f5454ef56af2 Fri, 31 May 2024 05:43:00 -0400 Is there an association between fatherhood and cardiovascular outcomes?
单次输注工程化 T 细胞可实现小鼠哮喘的持久缓解研究人员证明，通过对小鼠进行工程化和长寿命的 CAR T 细胞治疗，可以实现持久的哮喘缓解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240531/Single-infusion-of-engineered-T-cells-achieves- permanent-asthma-remission-in-mice.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240531/Single-infusion-of-engineered-T-cells-achieves- permanent-asthma-remission-in-mice.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ed514174-0481-4b1a-b419-6d1f7adc3233 Fri, 31 May 2024 04:56:00 -0400 Single infusion of engineered T-cells achieves lasting asthma remission in mice

RNA 干扰剂 plozasiran 靶向 APOC3 有效治疗混合性高脂血症研究人员评估了 plazosiran 治疗对混合性高脂血症成年患者空腹甘油三酯水平的疗效。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240531/RNA-interference-agent-plozasiran-targets-APOC3-for- effective-mixed-hyperlipidemia-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240531/RNA-interference-agent-plozasiran-targets-APOC3-for- effective-mixed-hyperlipidemia-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7828e0ab-65a2-4b25-abc1-a64c4cb126a8 Fri, 31 May 2024 04:06:00 -0400 RNA interference agent plozasiran targets APOC3 for effective mixed hyperlipidemia treatment
研究人员发现了儿童脊索瘤的两类遗传原因人们对脊索瘤（一种罕见且具有侵袭性的骨肿瘤）的遗传学和生物学知之甚少。在美国，每年约有百万分之一的人患有脊索瘤，其中只有百分之五是儿童。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240530/Researchers-uncover-two-classes-of-genic-causes-for-pediatric-chordoma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240530/Researchers-uncover-two-classes-of-genic-causes-for-pediatric-chordoma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6e3a21a4-caef-41f7-ab4c-91ebab7141ea Thu, 30 May 2024 23:24:24 -0400 Researchers uncover two classes of genetic causes for pediatric chordoma
研究可能有助于开发新的精神分裂症个性化治疗方法 一项国际研究出版物...一项由德尔马医院医学研究所牵头，与巴斯克地区大学神经精神药理学小组 (UPV/EHU) 的研究人员和 CIBER 心理健康 (CIBERSAM) 的研究人员合作进行的一项国际研究，发表在《自然通讯》上，可能有助于为诊断为精神分裂症的人创造新的个性化治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240530/Study-may-facilitate-the-development-of-new-personalized-treatments-for-schizophrenia-An-International-Study-Publi.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240530/Study-may-facilitate-the-development-of-new-personalized-treatments-for-schizophrenia-An-International-Study-Publi.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b952198e-0628-4013-8b39-81716e7e7d99 Thu, 30 May 2024 22:54:13 -0400 Study may facilitate the development of new personalized treatments for schizophrenia An International Study Publi...
维克森林大学的研究人员获得 150 万美元的 NIH 拨款来研究减肥手术后的骨骼健康维克森林大学医学院的研究人员从美国国立卫生研究院下属的国家关节炎、肌肉骨骼和皮肤疾病研究所获得了为期五年、价值 150 万美元的资助，用于研究减肥手术后患者的骨微结构。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240530/Wake-Forest-researchers-to-study-bone-health-post-bariatric-surgery-with-2415-million-NIH-grant.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240530/Wake-Forest-researchers-to-study-bone-health-post-bariatric-surgery-with-2415-million-NIH-grant.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5a716d2c-d50c-4300-b3a9-d4ad2ca4618d Thu, 30 May 2024 22:48:05 -0400 Wake Forest researchers to study bone health post-bariatric surgery with $1.5 million NIH grant
